bookInfo.notes: J.S. = John Shirley. An abridgment of books 1-4 of 'Amadís de Gaula'.

titleGroup.fullTitle: The famous and delightful history of the renowned and valiant Prince Amadis de Gaul. Setting forth His Glorious Adventures, and Success in Arms, during his Travels into the most Known Parts of the World. His Unparrellel'd Love to the Fair Princess Oriana, and his Success therein. Being A True Pattern of Heroick Valour and Virtuous Love. The Original having been Translated into all European Languages, and highly Esteemed of. The Whole now Abridg'd by J. S. Gent.
titleGroup.displayTitle: The famous and delightful history of the renowned and valiant Prince Amadis de Gaul. Setting forth His Glorious Adventures, and Success in Arms, ...
titleGroup.uniformTitle: Amadís de Gaula (Spanish romance) Book 1-4. Abridgments

imprint.imprintFull: London : printed for J. Gwillim, over against the Great James Tavern in Bishops-Gate-Street, 1702.
imprint.imprintPublisher: printed for J. Gwillim, over against the Great James Tavern in Bishops-Gate-Street
